titles.title: To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to provide surviving spouses with certain protections relating to mortgages and mortgage foreclosures.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E653)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary: 3/30/2011--Introduced. Amends the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to afford surviving spouses of servicemembers who die while in the military and whose death is service-connected the same protections against sale, foreclosure, and seizure of property currently applicable to their husbands who while in military service are unable to meet an obligation on real or personal property.
